data.name: Remio
data.description:
Play lots of free games!

Complete Obstacles and Puzzle Races!

Make epic YouTube content!

Role play!

Be birds or spiders!

Live in cities and build houses!

Join our Discord: https://discord.com/invite/YrZwpCANQN

changelog.change_log:
General:
-Networking and log optimizations

Gorilla-craft
-Health apples and ores
-Took away one tower, some weapons and the lobby rail to improve performance
Bug fixes and improvements

- Add new avatars to Stone Age
- Bug fixes to Stone Age and Animal City
Improved LODs on Gorilla Craft PvP

In Gorilla Craft:
- Added LODs for: bow and arrows, grenades, crates, barrels, hologram wisps
- optimized scroll view
- hide voxel buttons on hands when not looking at them
- Trying "unload far chunks" optimization again now that the void is gone

In Rem City maps:
- Fix for players falling forever
- Fix pets nav mesh in Rem City Animals
- Added mines portals to Animal City and Rem City Animals

- Launched Animal City 
- Launched Gorilla Craft PvP 
- Launched BlockIt Western
- Stone Age now begins in a common building area
- Pet naming now possible in all spaces that allow pets
Bug fixes and improvements

Rem City Animals:
- All WingIt avatars are now available

Gorilla Craft
- Make creator panel in lobby visible for super admins

Stone Age
- Fix bug where you fall to the bottom
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements

Bug Fix:
- pet stuck on trade confirm screen fix
- login fix unhandled operationcancelled
- mines ore spawning fix
- hologram loading fix
- suspend user while in app fix

General Feature:
- Oculus Friend Invite

Gorilla Craft:
- Add room saving and publishing and private rooms
Bug fixes and improvements

Blockit Unleashed: added melody sfx for slicing

general:
-optimized spawn vfx
-changes to networking configuration

Gorilla Craft improvements:
- Late joiner sync optimizations
- removed paintball avatar items from avatar

Gorilla Craft:
- Late joiner sync fix

General:
- Mouth movement sync fix

General:
- Fusion merged in
Remcity:
- analytics for AI pet muting
RemCraft:
- More blocks
- Late joiner sync added
Added floor to RemCraft to prevent endless falling
Add RemCraft (Beta) to the lineup of games
